subject: TCO Round 2
body:
Hello sm1lies,

Round 2 is here! You don't want to miss this round of the 2007 TopCoder(R) Open, sponsored by AOL(R), so login to the applet to chat with the competitors and see some of the best coding take place.  Round 2 will be held Saturday, April 14, at 1:00 PM EDT (GMT/UTC -4).  See what time it starts in your area: http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?month=4&day=14&year=2007&hour=13&min=0&sec=0&p1=98

***********************************************************************
Your skills expand our world of opportunities.  It starts with you.

The global financial markets are increasingly electronic and trading in these markets presents a unique combination of technical and trading acumen.  

UBS is responsible for trading 1 out of every 9 shares globally (leading private industry survey) and is looking for technologists to help us develop advanced trading algorithms, build the underlying infrastructure to trade with milliseconds of latency, and integrate access to a wide range of global products.

We have numerous career opportunities for exceptional TopCoder members interested in joining one of the global market leaders in the financial services industry.  

Consider becoming part of an exciting future at UBS.  

You & Us. UBS.

UBS is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity in its workplace. (M/F/D/V)
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=tournaments&d2=tco07&d3=sponsorspatrons&d4=ubs
***********************************************************************

Don't miss the excitement of Round 2 of the TCO, and remember to compete in the next SRM on Wednesday, April 18 at 11:00 AM EDT (GMT/UTC -4).  

Best of luck to you in the Arena!

- The TopCoder Competitions Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder competitions.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, log in to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.

www.topcoder.com

703 Hebron Avenue
Glastonbury, CT 06033
